Instance.description: A sim template for creating premade Sims to populate premade households.

TunableTuple.name: _sim_creation_info
TunableTuple.description: Sim creation info for the premade Sim.

Tunable.name: specify_breed_name
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: first_name
Tunable.description: The Sim's first name.

Tunable.name: specify_last_name
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: resource_key
Tunable.description: The SimInfo file to use.

TunableVariant.name: career_level
TunableVariant.description: If specified, the premade Sim will be in the career at this career level.

TunableVariant.name: career_lot
TunableVariant.description: If specified and Sim is initialized with a career, the premade Sim's career location will be initially set to the zone associated with the provided premade lot description.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The lot to be initially associated with the Sim's career

TunableVariant.name: clan_info
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the premade Sim will be assigned to a clan.

Tunable.name: clan
Tunable.description: The clan this premade Sim should be assigned to.

Tunable.name: leader
Tunable.description: If enabled, this premade Sim will be assigned as the leader of the specified clan.

TunableList.name: client_fixups
TunableList.description: A list of client fixups that will be applied to the SimInfo

TunableTuple.name: kingdom_sim_client_fixup
TunableTuple.description: A fixup for a Sim that belongs to a kingdom.

Tunable.name: inheriting_premade_sim
Tunable.description: The premade Sim that will inherit the title and kingdom of this Sim.

Tunable.name: level
Tunable.description: The level of the kingdom this Sim belongs to.

Tunable.name: priority
Tunable.description: The priority of the sim in the kingdom.

TunableList.name: clubs
TunableList.description: Clubs this premade Sim is part of.

Tunable.name: leader
Tunable.description: If enabled, this Sim will be the leader of the club.

Tunable.name: seed
Tunable.description: The club seed for the premade Sim to be in.

Tunable.name: is_black_sheep
Tunable.description: If enabled, this Sim will be a black sheep in the dynasty.

Tunable.name: is_head
Tunable.description: If enabled, this Sim will be the head of the dynasty.

Tunable.name: is_heir
Tunable.description: If enabled, this Sim will be the heir of the dynasty.

Tunable.name: seed
Tunable.description: The dynasty seed for the premade Sim to be in.

TunableVariant.name: occult
TunableVariant.description: Whether or not the Sim will have an occult.

Tunable.name: occult_sim_info
Tunable.description: The SimInfo file to use for the occult form of this Sim. It is assumed that the sim info provided with the Sim Creation Info is the base/non-occult form.

TunableEnum.name: occult_type
TunableEnum.description: The occult type this sim info represents. You do not need to tune the occult traits on the Sim Template. The traits will be added as a result of this tuning being set.

TunableVariant.name: packed_pronouns
TunableVariant.description: The Sim's customized pronouns. Comma delimited string of: subjective objective possessive dependent possessive independent reflexive e.g. 'He,him,his,his,himself'

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableVariant.name: pregnancy
TunableVariant.description: Whether or not the sim will be pregnant.

TunableEnum.name: origin
TunableEnum.description: Define the origin of this pregnancy. This value is used to determine some of the random elements at birth.

Tunable.name: other_parent
Tunable.description: The other sim whose traits will be passed on to the offspring.

Tunable.name: progress
Tunable.description: Progress into the pregnancy, where 0% is recently conceived to 100% where labor can happen at any second.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The track to give the sim.
